title: Customer Locked Keys in Car
description: A customer calls because they have locked their keys inside their vehicle and need it unlocked remotely.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's account.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's identity using security questions to prevent unauthorized access.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully authenticates the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Send a remote command to unlock the vehicle's doors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the unlock command, and the customer confirms the vehicle is unlocked.
